title: Ep. 201 - A Brave Journalist Tells The Truth About The Media
description:
Today on the show, a mainstream media journalist shows some rare courage. Also, Democrats are trying desperately (and hilariously) to distance themselves from Jussie Smollett. Finally, headlines claim that a middle school student was arrested for refusing to stand for the pledge. That’s not the whole story. Date: 02-19-2019
